timeline.message:
Adding full support for Wildfly 17, 18
Fixing issue with missing JavaEE 8 web profile
Removing external downloads and updating schemas
Updating licenseinfo.xml

timeline.bodyText: Are these comments something we could enable in the future?
timeline.author: emilianbold

replies.bodyText: I don't think those are required at all. i should remove them
replies.author: ehsavoie
